1.content:
Life here was pretty terrible, so when you discovered you apparently now possessed the strange power to leave your body and possess others. You had tested this power once or twice on people in your apartment complex, but now it was time to check out what else you could do.

So, where to begin?
1.title: The start.

12.content: Faster than a speeding bullet!
12.title: Superfamily

13.content: There's plenty to choose from in the Justice League, but which one?
13.title: Justice Leaguers

131.content:
One day was all it took to change your life in an incredible way. On this special day, you were hit with a magical blast of energy from out of the blue. The blast left you without injuries, and instead gave you a special ability without compare. You had gained the ability to possess any super hero you wished to, the only restriction was that it must be a woman, which you didn't even consider a downside.

You never tried this power out until today, a day you were particularly curious about the female body. You were without instructions on how to use this power, but you felt that simply thinking of a super heroine would allow you to possess her.

The choice to you was obvious, Wonder Woman would be the perfect test subject! Her beautiful black flowing hair, her long and tone legs, her gracious curves, all of these were just perfect to fulfill your desires.

You closed your eyes to focus your thoughts, leading them toward the image of Wonder Woman in your head. You felt a tug in your chest as you began to feel disoriented and your head felt fuzzy.

In a flash, you felt your soul tear from your body and rocket to an unknown direction at thousands of miles an hour hitting a sudden stop when entering a blurred figure. You gasped a shaky breath as your vision returned to you. You took a few minutes to let yourself get orientated with your surroundings.

You were in a room full of ancient, modern, and advanced weaponry as well as practice dummies. A bed lay against one of the walls, but other than that it was almost bland.

"Did it wo-HOLY CRAP!" You covered your mouth as you heard a female voice escape your lips. You looked down for the first time and saw two well sized mounds of flesh covered by a patriotic looking bathing suit. A wide smile ran across your face and a cheer left your mouth as you leapt into the air with a fist to the sky.

You had done it! You were now Wonder Woman! And oh just how wonderful it felt to be in her! Her long luscious black hair, toned legs, magnificent figure, all at your hands. You felt strength run through every part of your body as you flexed every muscle you could. You kept getting warmer as you admired Diana's body.

What do you do with it?
131.title: Wonder Woman

15.content: Plenty of other groups and teams to pick from!
15.title: Somebody else

155.content: We're missing out on some people, aren't we?
155.title: Villains!

1553.content: Would you like to be one of the Gotham City Rogues?
1553.title: Lets get gritty.

15531.content: Would you like to be the clown queen of crime?
15531.title: Harley Quinn?

155311.content:
It had been a pretty rough night after you got caught up in that weird magical business on the streets. You knew that taking work as a hired thug wasn't a good idea, but hey, you needed the cash that day. You stumble into your apparent and onto you bed, checking your phone and seeing a report that Harley Quinn had broken out again. You roll your eyes. "Revolving freaking door." Though you did have to admit that she was one hell of a good looker, even in that jester looking outfit.

You yawn and drift off, thinking about the clown girl in your final moments of consciousness...


You wake up suddenly, shooting straight up from the bed and shaking your head in a dazed manner. "Ugh- geez..." You mumble to yourself. That blast must have screwed you up pretty bad, you didn't even... feel like.... "AAAAAAH!" You let out a girlish scream as you finally get enough of yourself together to notice that you certainly weren't where you fell asleep, and you really weren't feeling yourself. You spring up out of the bed and run to the room's nearest mirror, clutching the sides of it as the manic looking blonde woman in it shoots you a look of crazed shock and fear.

Only problem, you were very quickly aware that the blonde woman in her bed shorts and tank top was you. "What in th' HELL happened t' me?!" You yell out loud, noting very quickly your girlish Brooklyn twanged voice. "Okay Charlie, calm down, ya gotta chill..." You tell yourself, trying to find comfort in your reflection but failing due to... well, it not being YOU in there. "Aaaaaaaw DAMN IT! Why th' hell am I HARLEY FRICKEN' QUINN?!" This would be the most insane thing of your life... and it was, but you were now a wanted man- woman? You clutch your blonde pigtails in frustration and yank them. "I'm screwed! I'm a psychotic clown girl on the run from th' law and I'm freakin' screwed."
155311.title: Clowin' around.

15532.content: Okay then, what about some of Superman's rogues gallery?
15532.title: City of Tomorrow

info.brief_description: You are a guy who's gained the power of possession in the DC Universe.
info.description:
You're just a guy from Gotham City, doing whatever you can to get by. But when you get hit with a magical blast, you gain the power to possess any body you wish.


Characters:

Charlie - You. Just a guy who's trying to get by.


The basic rules of this story are as follows;

1. No killing off the Main Character
2. Anything goes sex wise
3. Everyone in this story is at least 18.
4. This is for the COMICS only! No animated Teen Titans. Certain characters original to shows like Artemis from Young Justice are fine, but otherwise this is a strictly comics based story.

Don't be afraid to add new chapters!
